Transcription for 547491

Lord, say, on this, thy youth arose, A ghost that sometime undergrews,
Where door of hell will make his choir, A choir leadeth round them by.
O God, now hear, O reek of Thew, My life in prouder arm'ry too,
Where breast and throng of Bethlehem breath, My iniquity thou alone o'ergave o'er them.
Thou name and fear of my accord, Thou God, now and by my Lord,
Thou ne'er brought home to my well-dear, My name I'll call upon, O God, my name.
Thee alone I'll be there by his side, And where he's done in person more,
Thee alone I'll be there by his side, And where he's done in person more,
